column1: I’m so ready for “our moment in history when no one is left on the sidelines.” You have motivated me so much tonight @ewarren! I’m ready to hit the campaign trail to elect our first woman president — and our greatest since FDR. #DemocraticDebate

I simply love how @ewarren doesn’t just propose free universal child care and pre-K but also raising compensation for the workers. All of us parents know how underpaid early childhood caregivers and teachers are. #DemocraticDebate

The 2020 national spotlight is on the counties I represent especially Macomb and that is why I endorsed @ewarren. Her analysis of corporate corruption ruining our country rings true to my working class constituents. She can win Macomb County Michigan and the White House.

I feel it in my bones: @ewarren will be sworn in as the first woman president of the United States 372 days from right now.  I want to be there! She’s the whole package: tough smart progressive well-spoken an American original. #DemocraticDebate
“A Democrat we can all believe in.” That’s @ewarren!!! #DemocraticDebate
.@ewarren: We’ve turned so many corners in Afghanistan that we’re going in circles.   Exactly!! #NoMoreEndlessWars
.@ewarren is so right. We must stop asking brave soldiers to solve problems that can’t be solved militarily. We need to focus on diplomacy and bring our combat troops home. #DemDebate
.@juliancastro had such an important voice on past debate stages and #TeamWarren is incredibly fortunate to have him on our side. #LFG https://t.co/RLqXeyoUEJ

I’m super excited about the movement @ewarren is building across Iowa and the nation so working people can reclaim the American Dream. I can’t wait to watch her tonight in Des Moines! #DemDebate #UnionStrong #1u https://t.co/s01sOH5k62
Every day that I get to serve you is an honor and you have my tremendous gratitude for the opportunity. We're ready for you 2020! https://t.co/Uhbr8qhgaH

Per the Constitution only Congress can authorize the use of military force. I hope the growing speculation is wrong that this strike may serve as a means to distract from the very serious matter of impeachment — an impeachment based in large part on defying the Constitution.
Nothing makes me happier than getting my dad together with his grandkids! https://t.co/k2mdZqRd6A

As we gather to catch up before Christmas I’m grateful for family above all.   I am grateful for our troubled nation holding onto our democracy with fierce devotion unity for justice admittedly out of reach for the moment but always in my sights.   Happy holidays to all! https://t.co/jEB3sNBCXr
Congrats to @ewarren on another outstanding debate! #DreamBigFightHard https://t.co/4kNwdZLwlW
When history is written I will have voted to protect our democracy. I will be voting yes on both articles of impeachment. #NotAboveTheLaw

You sent a new majority to the House to be a check on a lawless president knowing the clear danger he presented. He abused the power of the presidency to win an election. Now we are here to protect our democracy and we take that honor and duty very seriously.

All kudos to Harvard’s graduate employees (including my own son Saul!) who went on strike this morning.  As an alum of the law school (go HLS class of 1994!) I call on Harvard to settle a just contract ASAP. #18monthsislongenough https://t.co/b8tuk9mqqy
I am one proud dad today! #HarvardYale @DivestHarvard @FossilFreeYale #NobodyWins #ClimateEmergency   https://t.co/3V4CfX2Coa https://t.co/3iA5SjkXlx
All across this country we have a crisis because teachers are not being paid properly here in Michigan Levin said. https://t.co/c8MOGOoqj1

Happy #ElectionDay! 🗳 Local elections are so important not just to choose our leaders but also to pass millages to fund or schools and important public services. There is still time to make a voting plan: https://t.co/nXgJsDoV1l #VoteOnNov5
ICYMI I shared my thoughts on the @UAW #GMStrike with the @Freep. https://t.co/xjWGcWPNry
Congrats to the national champ Nats from a forever Tigers fans. Those Nats just refused to give up. Gotta love the underdogs!
Happy #Diwali! This year’s Hindu Festival of Lights is a reminder that light will always prevail over darkness. ✨

OK friends I got my first taste of @ewarren’s @IAforWarren campaign - and it was awesome!! So much passion and human solidarity. My confidence in this campaign only continues to grow. https://t.co/PeJRr7SYtA

Folks work as temps for years with no assurance of reaching permanent status or decent wages and permanent workers wait up to 3000 days to get full pay - even on the second tier! So long Generous Motors.
Production workers used to get to full pay after 90 days and it was a wage you could raise a family on with good benefits too. Now? GM keeps a divisive two-tier pay scale.

.@GM used to be called Generous Motors for negotiating contracts with the @UAW that literally built the American middle class. In the 21st Century forcing its loyal workers out on strike for weeks on end it’s #GrinchMotors all the way. #1u #GMStrike https://t.co/2M95G87qSf

The spirit tonight was tremendous and I just can’t believe the commitment of veteran @GM workers to help their temporary worker brothers and sisters. It’s a theme in every picket line I join that the abuse of the temp system poisons their work culture. @UAW #1u #Solidarity https://t.co/buFPNHCFfw

A solution for temporary workers and wage increases are essential and non-negotiable. @GM must bring a fair deal to the negotiating table without delay. @UAW members have worked too hard for too long to be denied dignity in the workplace. #1u https://t.co/R7QEk62Viu

It’s no wonder @UAW members feel betrayed by @GM. The UAW helped prop up the company during the auto industry collapse by making big concessions in wages & benefits. It’s past time for GM to restore the concessions & give UAW members a fair contract. #1u  https://t.co/uY1dekGjI6

On Day 17 of their strike for all American workers I stand in solidarity with my @UAW brothers and sisters as they demand that @GM provide good health care and benefits wage increases a plan to fix the temp worker scam and a commitment to build more product in the US. #1u

@Blue__America @RepAndyLevin @downwithtyranny @OurRevMichigan @OaklandDems @oc115 @jaclynmdiaz @dnewhauser @vmontoroCSPAN Wow thanks for endorsing me @Blue__America and recognizing my 100% progressive voting record. As I disappear into quiet reflection for the Jewish New Year I thank all for your support and wish you a sweet and healthy year to come!!
It’s time for @GM to settle the strike. #GMStrike #1u https://t.co/HlTDOdvV2y

The @NRCC’s attack on Amanda Cunningham is simply gross and it crosses a line of appropriate online behavior. Talking about people’s marriages? Really? I hope they take down the tweet apologize and train folks so such behavior ceases. https://t.co/DDIseR4Bdf

The stand that @UAW workers is taking is all the more important to ensure 1) that America becomes a leader in producing electric cars and 2) that American workers are secured a future in their production. #StandWithUs #GMStrike #1u https://t.co/5ZJNkKPZIK
So I am glad to see @GM reverse itself and I hope it leads the company to turn over a new leaf and bargain a just contract - now. https://t.co/eJE90riBn2

GM’s sudden cutoff of health care was an extraordinarily hostile act unprecedented in @UAW negotiations and work stoppages for decades. It led to untold anxiety and suffering for @GM working families.

I'm hopeful that @GM is ready to negotiate in good faith with the @UAW to deliver the wages benefits and workplace rights that workers deserve and finally end this strike. #StandWithUs #1u https://t.co/8hio7CdWos
It was great to be with our next president again tonight. She wowed a standing room only gathering of the Congressional Progressive Caucus. https://t.co/xf3Dviuwlh

If I didn’t have to be in DC for votes I would be with my @UAW brothers and sisters demanding fairness and holding @GM accountable on the picket line. From afar I still stand with them. #StandWithUs #GMStrike #1u

Mike Siegel inspires me no end. I desperately need more comrades in the urgent fight to tackle climate change in a way-beyond-business-as-usual way. I want to see him in the House in January 2021! https://t.co/Eh1vaVrnxi

Momentum is on our side. It's time for @GM to come to the table and negotiate a contract that ensures @UAW workers:  ❌ Fair wages ❌ Affordable healthcare ❌ Their share of profits ❌ Job security ❌ A defined path to permanent seniority for temp workers.  #GMStrike #StandWithUs
What a fun surprise to see my friend from back in my organizing days @cecilerichards show up for @uaw’s #SolidaritySunday with @ewarren! #GMStrike #1u https://t.co/XR8c8352Nu

The #GMstrike is about raising the standard of living for working people. @UAW members like all workers deserve fair wages affordable health care and job security. I’m proud to stand with them. #StandWithUs
.@VP has it completely backwards. @UAW members are striking as a result of flaws in NAFTA that the USMCA fails to fix! https://t.co/OIie6uGAzU
Wow @ewarren is on fire! https://t.co/r5FfOgDZSm

@RepAndyLevin     OK GM time is up. Please get to yes on a contract that adds production here instead of Mexico and allows your workers to share fully in GM’s success!  I stand with the UAW brothers and sisters in MI 09 and beyond! https://t.co/V81BnCFKzV

Grandma’s union recipe: take America’s workers in all of our beautiful and multi-faceted diversity. Pour into bowl of democratic self-governance Sprinkle with education and training. Mix in healthy dollop of activism to support others. Voila! Worker voice and power. https://t.co/rS2zgtTBoK
What an honor to represent my candidate for president before the press for the first time after she did so well in the debate tonight. https://t.co/xSZzsAVVAU
Yes! @ewarren truly understands that US trade policy has been hurting workers for decades. Together we will chart a new course.
As vice chair of the House Education and Labor Committee I can’t tell you how exciting it is to hear @ewarren talk about truly universal public education from pre-k to higher ed.  We can do this!
We have to work way way faster and way way more comprehensively to save life on Earth as we know it. @ewarren will lead the way!
One of the best moments yet! https://t.co/MIQDhSS0VX
“I’m not afraid and if you want to win you can’t be afraid either.”  Damn right @ewarren I’m with you.
. @ewarren will keep our borders secure and treat everyone like human beings. Basic. Right on.
“We are All Democrats. Let’s not use Republican talking points to discuss health care.” Go @ewarren!
“Big structural change” -@ewarren. I’m in.
I can’t believe I’m sitting here with @SenMarkey and @RepDebHaaland as early supporters of @ewarren ready to hear her opening statement. Let’s go!

Historic change requires three things: bold vision; a real bottom-up social movement demanding change; and tough inspiring leadership to help deliver it. That's why I'm throwing in with @ewarren! https://t.co/I3CxjKyrtx

Patriotism reigned across #MI09 this #MemorialDayWeekend2019. I love how so many folks turn out to remember and celebrate the people who have and continue to protect our nation. https://t.co/EFRjydbkzr
Are you available to walk with my family and me in one of the parades in Michigan’s 9th District this #MemorialDayWeekend?   Sign up: https://t.co/AKimcLQj8K https://t.co/EGGTnOuKI7

Give us fairness.  That’s what 23 bipartisan lawmakers asked for in a letter led by Republican Rep. John Moolenaar and me to the heads of Homeland Security and ICE. As I continue to have these conversations support for this principle of fairness grows.  https://t.co/AksaKHdS45
So great to get the ball rolling on @Peters4Michigan re-election effort. Great job Ed @alysadiebolt and Macomb Dems. #MI09 will put Gary over the top in 2020! https://t.co/snOFX558cx

I’m so encouraged by the mighty 9th District Dems—the people stepping up to run for office organize their neighborhoods and make hype signs for their Congressman! All I can say is Look out 2020!! https://t.co/2JD4P6G7dW
Last week marked 100 days in the House of Representatives and I wanted to show you what I've been up to here at home and on your behalf in Washington. https://t.co/bRg6SQbw0i https://t.co/H3551zPavC

I heard @davidfolkenflik and @maggieNYT talking about Trump and @IlhanMN and I called because I’m concerned about the endless fascination with his attacks. We can’t normalize white supremacy or incitement of violence just because it’s coming from the highest office in the land. https://t.co/cKju7aDS4q
OMG. How can this be happening? All power to the firefighters of Paris right now. https://t.co/S9ckACfufn

Hats off to @LightfootForChi who graduated from @UMich clerked for my cousin Charles Levin on the @MISupremeCourt and has been an amazing advocate in Chicago. Now she’s poised to become the first black woman and openly gay person to lead Chicago.   https://t.co/PL1mwm50Hs

@HaleyLive @charles_gaba How many members of Congress can say they have one of the most thoughtful national health policy analysts like @Charles_Gaba as a constituent and such a powerhouse neighbor like @HaleyLive?!

On the anniversary of #Parkland I want to honor the momentum these young people in Florida brought to the movement including inspiring our @SDAOakMac in MI-09. Our new gun sense majority in the House will have your back and follow your awesome leadership. #EndGunViolence https://t.co/qcY4XpNaM9

It feels right to get up before dawn to hustle home with so many colleagues from around the country for the funeral of John D. Dingell. Sleep? Weather? Mr. D never wanted to hear any excuses about doing the right thing!

I wasn’t sure in the depths of winter with this crazy weather we’ve been having what today would be like but @MichiganDems had such a great turnout! People are so energized—like instead of 2018 being the end goal it was just one lap in the race to 2020! It was exciting! https://t.co/M7Ocs7sEIx
